content: SP-L masonry core bit (inch) Premium core bit for coring in all types of masonry – for <2.5 kW tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Equidist technology (above 1 3/8 diameter) – precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Fast and easy hole starting with the optional hole-starting aid Robust laser-welded segments Diamond core bit without the Hilti X-Change module system Applications Hand-held dry coring in all types of masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Additional Accessory Information: Core bit diameters are nominal, for actual diameter please contact Hilti Customer Service For use with: DD 110-D, DD 110-W, DD 130, DD 150-U Base materials: Masonry Technical Data | For use with | DD 110-D, DD 110-W, DD 130, DD 150-U | Base materials | Masonry | Drilling Mode | Hand-held, Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Dry | Connection end | BI (Hilti), BS (1-1/4 in), BT (5/8 in), No connection end | Segment height | 8 mm ### ITEMS- 3640438 - Core Bit BI 1-5/8X12 SP-L MASONRY - Package Size 1 pc - 3640439 - Core Bit BI 2X12 SP-L MASONRY - Package Size 1 pc - 3651905 - Core Bit BS 2X12 SP-L MASONRY - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x B 52/320 SP-L Core bit mason. -
